body: Third to last story, who drew that one?
I just finished watching how to get away with murder, an innocent women who was raped since she was a child lost in court and now I can’t read any of this without feeling extremely guilty 💀

This was nice, it's a shame they didn't really have sex.
It's also a shame Morishima Kon only did the cover.
very nice, even if i can't understand most of it :) girls that enjoy themselves are huge turn on

Why the cocktease tho? I mean, the drawings are 10/10 imho and I think all of it is excellent fap fuel but sex scenes would have seriously made it better for everybody, especially since most of us can't even understand Japanese.
Nice that all of these were shota. But they were all cock teases.
Big disappointment, hardly any real sex in this one.  Mostly groping and fumbling about sex.
